system.description: Character is trained in Bolt, Chain, Melta, Plasma, Power, Flame, Primitive (Ranged and Melee), Las, Launcher, SP, and Thrown weapons. Effectively, they are trained in all weapon types except exotic weapons.

specialAbilities.description: Trained in all non-exotic weapon types: Bolt, Chain, Melta, Plasma, Power, Flame, Primitive, Las, Launcher, SP, and Thrown. No -20 untrained penalty for these weapons.
